name: per_player_catchable_deep_target
expected_query: with "tbbdfd13be08979a2001f99bb2d2c789e" as (select "nfl_plays"."trg_pid" as "pid", SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as rate_type_total_count from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "nfl_plays"."dot" between 20 and 99 and "nfl_plays"."catchable_ball" = true group by "nfl_plays"."trg_pid"), "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, "nfl_plays"."year", SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as trg_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."year", COALESCE(trg_pid)) select "player"."pid", CAST(t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd.trg_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(tbbdfd13be08979a2001f99bb2d2c789e.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS "trg_from_plays_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "tbbdfd13be08979a2001f99bb2d2c789e" on "tbbdfd13be08979a2001f99bb2d2c789e"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd" on "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by "t1c3fcb1f32313815df18da7f8e31c3cd"."trg_from_plays", tbbdfd13be08979a2001f99bb2d2c789e.rate_type_total_count, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
